mean_cn: n.派别，小集团，小派系；派系斗争，内讧
mean_en: a small group of people within a larger one whose members have some different aims and beliefs to those of the larger group
sentence: The leaders of two opposing factions had a talk.
sentence_trans: 这两个敌对派系的领导人进行了会谈。
word_etyma: fact做，制作 + ion名词后缀 → [一帮人]做 → 宗派，小集团
